properties.areaDesc: Delaware, OK; Cherokee, OK; Adair, OK
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 9 at 6:50PM CST until January 12 at 10:10PM CST by NWS Tulsa OK
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in
Oklahoma...

Illinois River near Watts affecting Adair and Delaware Counties.

Illinois River at Chewey affecting Adair...Cherokee and Delaware
Counties.

Illinois River near Tahlequah affecting Cherokee County.

Flint Creek near Kansas affecting Cherokee and Delaware Counties.

Baron Fork River at Eldon affecting Cherokee County.

Poteau River near Panama affecting Le Flore County.

Kiamichi River near Antlers affecting Pushmataha County.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Illinois River at Chewey.
* from Saturday morning to Sunday evening, or until the warning is
cancelled.
* At 6:15 PM Thursday, the stage was  4.69 feet.
* Flood stage is 12.0 feet.
* Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The Illinois River at Chewey is expected to rise above
flood stage Saturday morning and continue to rise to near 18.3 feet
by Sunday before dawn . The river is expected to fall below flood
stage Sunday afternoon.
* Impact...At 19.0 feet, severe flooding occurs from near Fidler's
Bend to near Hanging Rock. Access roads near the river are cut off.
Roads near Hanging Rock may be impassible. Farmlands are inundated.
Extreme turbulence makes the river too hazardous for floating.
